name: 2-Buttons Smash
description:
A little game I made for the 2-buttons game jam. By the time i found out about this jam, I already only have 2 days left to submit so i have very little time to work with. And that's why the game currently have only 1 stage and 2 characters. But I maybe will draw more character sprites and do more balancing.

Controls:

Left Key - Move

Right Key - Attack

Left + Right - Gaurd
